title: beta regression: $crate may not be imported

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
Number of crates regressed: 26

Looks like essentially all the regressions come from a piston2d-gfx_graphics macro. Bisecting this may be helpful, not sure.

cc @petrochenkov 

<details>

- [`ThePianoDentist/rusty-dota-manager`](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.42-rustdoc-1/beta-2020-02-05/gh/ThePianoDentist.rusty-dota-manager/log.txt)
